Row.Text: Welcome to the Pictish lands. I'm Oengus map Fergus, ruler of the people. I hope you mean no harm to them.
You must be a leader like me; if you bring trouble, then you might as well surrender now.
The lands are yours, as is my crown and people, but not their spirit. We will return!
I may be gone, but I can now reside in heaven. Have a nice trip to hell.
We have had enough of the evils you bring here! On behalf of the Picts, I declare war agianst you!
I don't know if we're able to end you, but we will put the pressure on until we are buried in the ground.
Ha! You really expect to be a match for us? Come on now, we have enemies to crush.
I want no relation to the outside world. Such savages.
